Sathyabama Institute of Science and Technology

Chennai, Tamil Nadu
NIRF:51
Sathyabama Institute of Science and Technology (SIST) is a private university in Chennai, Tamil Nadu, India. It was founded in 1987 as Sathyabama Engineering College and became a university in 2001. SIST is a research-intensive university with world-class research facilities and laboratories. It offers undergraduate, postgraduate, and doctoral programs in engineering, architecture, dental, arts, commerce, and science. SIST is accredited by the National Assessment and Accreditation Council (NAAC) with an A++ grade. It is approved by AICTE and is consistently ranked among the top 50 universities in India. In 2021, the National Institutional Ranking Framework (NIRF) ranked it 40th among Indian universities. In 2023, it was ranked 51st in the NIRF university ranking
Admission to all the B.Tech Programmes for the year 2024 is based on any one of the following: 10+2 with 45% aggregate Class 12th with Mathematics, Physics, and any one of the following subjects: • Chemistry • Computer Science • Electronics • Information Technology • Biology • Informatics Practices • Biotechnology • Technical Vocational Subject • Agriculture • Engineering Graphics • Business Studies • Entrepreneurship
  • Entrance Examination – Engineering 2024
  • Accepting exams: CBSE 12th, ISC, Tamilnadu 12th, TNEA, SAEEE
